ICANDELO LOMPHATHISWA WEZIMALI: UBUME






UBUME



IINTETHO

USHICILELO



AMAQUMRHU KAHULUMENTE



UQHAGAMSHELWANO



ICandelo loMphathiswa lilo elijongene nemigaqo-nkqubo nokuqulunqwa kwemithetho emalunga nemicimbi engengxowa-mali karhulumente. Eli Candelo loMphathiswa likwajongene noku kulandelayo:
* ukusungula imigaqo-nkqubo nemithetho yesizwe
* ukulungelelanisa imisebenzi kaNondyebo weSizwe, i-Statistcs SA kunye neeNkonzo zoMzantsi Afrika zeNgeniso
* nokuqulunqa kwanokusungula imithetho
* nokuqhuba nayiphi na eminye imisebenzi yolawulo emiselwe kuMgaqo-siseko okanye kwimithetho yesizwe.


IWEBSITE: www.gov.za/ministry/finance.php
